Topic.Title: Sybs, short the builders at will if they cap deductions...

Message.Msg: Sybs: Stocks, like inflation, are not monolithic. Some stocks will certainly bounce from here. It won't be the usual SS subjects because they've burned most of their short interest fire. The only thing keeping this up is weekly option buyers hoping to get rich quick. I'm plenty comfortable holding and adding to all of my short positions, and long positions for that matter. If they ever were to extend LT capital gains threshold to 2 or 3 years, these MOMO stocks would crash in a heartbeat. No one would be willing to hold the risk that long... Conversely, money would flow into the real investments that have been held back. Matter of time. They need the revenues and the best way to accomplish it is to limit the increase but extend the horizon. They'd get a windfall because everyone would sell these like crazy...

Topic.Title: Techstrategy is a complete loser

Message.Msg: Funny. I did rather well today. And I will do rather well on INTC over time. You daytraders who lack any fundamental compass to guide your decisions simply have no idea where anything will head longer term. I do. And I am happy to accumulate at a discount to fair value.

Topic.Title: If I were buying a Tablet and was Price Consious

Message.Msg: Wiped out because Amazon is making itself vulnerable by stacking loss leader on top of loss leader? Wiped out because unlike other people's merchandise, it doesn't get the benefit of negative working capital because it sells its own stuff at cost? Wiped out because it is undermining its own content sales with Prime? Wiped out because it undermined its own cash flow heading into a period of tightening by offering monthly Prime? Look, it has no service and support. Best Buy will make big headway this holiday season on big ticket item electronic goods. I'm all for Amazon shipping as much low density stuff for free as possible this holiday season, including its loss leading Kindle platform (although Nexus and iPad will still dominate and people are wildly underestimating the popularity of Chromebooks... my kids all use Google Apps / Drive at school and I'm getting each of them a Chromebook). Google has the model right. GRPN also has it right. Amazon has it wrong. And this supernova will be EPIC. Just don't try to time it. Don't buy short term puts because on any ST horizon, the quants will successfully scalp the premium. But, as time passes it will get harder every day because this scam is going to run into real problems in 2013.

Topic.Title: Techstrategy is a complete loser

Message.Msg: Tech, I'm grateful for the INTC sell off. I had planned on rolling back yesterday from my Jan '15 25 calls. I sold them in the late morning and waited to buy the 20's. I held off all day and then waited all day today. Finally picked them up at the close for $1.20 more than what I sold the 25s for! To make it even better it's didn't cost me a dime because I made the difference on my AMZN short. I love it when a plan comes together! Speaking of B.A. ... glad to see Sybs in the INTC trade. At some point, if this market continues to sell off, money will pour into INTC. Low pe, high dividend, great cash flow, tons of cash, best of breed. Even "Dogs of the Dow" theory comes into play. - PJ

Topic.Title: If I were buying a Tablet and was Price Consious

Message.Title: On a lighter note, Jill Kelley......
Message.Msg: Ring... ring. "Hello"? "Oh Hi Sis" "Nutthin much.... just hanging out in the front sittting room while I watch a live CNN report about me on the flatscreen with 50 reporters right outside, and the blinds wide open" "I know!.. I know!...They keep showing that pic of us when we had those beads on." "Uggggggh... that is so my bad profile side!" "Hey do you think I would look cute if I wear my gold pumps with my pink dress" "Cool... Im gonna pretend I have somewhere important to go and I'll take the Mercedes" "Im gonna strike a couple poses while they are watching me leave" "Do you think it would be obvious if I were to flick my hair a couple times?" "You think?..I know right.. You can never be too cute and maybe that hot FBI guy is watching me" "Hehehehe"

Topic.Title: amzn longs are not giving in

Message.Msg: It's not about that, I saw the warehouses and robots. You had better hope cnbc does not run that clip again. The more these basher articles come, the more calls I buy. "Not only does Amazon sell through its website but it is now able to ship at little to no cost. Packages get there within a day or two (and it's getting closer to same day delivery). There is no other company that comes remotely close to this network. The scary part for competitors is that Amazon's lead is only growing bigger thanks to huge reinvestment in warehouses, robots that automate the actual shipping, distribution centers close to big centers like New York, etc." only part that idiot got right
